name: Teddy's Inferno
description:
Survive as long as possible against increasingly-frantic waves of enemies and reach a new high score!

Controls:

  • W to activate thrust
  • A and D to turn left and right
    • Shift (hold) to turn more slowly
  • O to fire stream of bullets
  • P to fire blasts of bullets
  • Q to Quickturn
  • E to Boost
  • Space to activate Bomb
  • F to pause
